means: 勉强的，愤恨的，不礼貌的

sentence.Network_en: I was often rude and ungracious in refusing help.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拒绝接受帮助的时候时常显得粗鲁无礼。

sentence.Network_en: It is ungracious of me not to acknowledge your help.
sentence.Network_cn: 你大力帮助而我尚未表示谢意,十分失礼.

sentence.Network_en: It would be ungracious not to accept your invitation.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ungracefully 笨拙地ungracious 不殷勤的ungraciously 不礼貌地
雅思词汇：无礼的和有礼貌的_无忧雅思网 ... indecent 不雅的; ungracious 没有礼貌教养的; insulting 羞辱的,无礼的.
绝望的主妇剧本Desperate Housewives S1... ... homeless: 无家可归的 ungracious: 没有吸引力的 afford: 担负得起.
ungraceful 没有风度的, ungracious 不合人意的, ungracious 不亲切的

list.abs: ungracious industrial city ; this curt summary is not meant to ungracious ; ungracious behavior .粗俗的工业城市；简略的总结并不意味着不优雅；粗俗的行为。
Now , Heaven send him an ungracious answer !, 愿上帝给他一个难堪的回答!
Now , Heaven send him an ungracious answer !, 愿上帝给他一个难堪的回答!
surely none of us would be an ungracious host .我们大家肯定没有人想作一个不像样的主人。

entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as ungracious, you mean that they are not polite or friendly in their speech or behaviour.

example.ex: ...his ungracious behaviour during the Queen's recent visit...
example.tran: 女王最近到访期间他的不得体行为

example.ex: I was often rude and ungracious in refusing help.
example.tran: 我拒绝接受帮助的时候时常显得粗鲁无礼。

sentences.sentence: "this curt summary is not meant to be ungracious"

auth_sentence.content: It would have been ungracious to say no.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would have been ungracious to say no.
